          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["However, in certain cases, the condition might be kept "],
              ["true", [["c"]]],
              [
                " intentionally, with the intention of exiting the loop using a "
              ],
              [
                "jump statement",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "http://stackoverflow.com/documentation/c/5568/jump-statements"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [" such as "],
              ["break", [["c"]]],
              ["."]
            ]
          },

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["In the above example, the variable "],
              ["i", [["c"]]],
              [
                ", the iterator, is initialized to 0. The test condition is initially "
              ],
              ["true", [["c"]]],
              [". However, "],
              ["i", [["c"]]],
              [
                " is not modified anywhere in the body and the update expression is empty. Hence, "
              ],
              ["i", [["c"]]],
              [" will remain 0, and the test condition will never evaluate to "],
              ["false", [["c"]]],
              [", leading to an infinite loop."]
            ]
          },
